title: Append new records to an existing table in a sql lite db — append_new_records
Append new records to an existing table in a sql lite db — append_new_records
code: if (FALSE) { shp_nc <- sf::st_read(system.file("shape/nc.shp", package="sf")) conn <- dbConnect(RSQLite::SQLite(), dbname  = here::here('inst','extdata', 'nc_test.db')) shp_nc_rnd <- shp_nc %>% mutate(across(where(is.numeric),  ~ rnorm(length(.),mean = 100))) # random values so these are new records append_new_records(shp_nc_rnd %>% head(10),                   conn,                   db_name =  here::here('inst','extdata', 'nc_test.db') ,                   tbl_name = 'nc_tbl',                   key=NULL) # use all columns + ignore geometry  }
